entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning late this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
